meanings.definition: Relaxed or informal in attitude or standards.
meanings.sent1: She is an easygoing person who doesn't get worked up over small things.
meanings.sent2: The easygoing atmosphere at the party made everyone feel comfortable.
meanings.sent3: His easygoing nature even in stressful situations always brings a smile to our faces.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed easygoing, mirroring his carefree spirit.
meanings.sent5: The easygoing cat lazily stretched out in the sun, embodying relaxation.

meanings.definition: Not easily upset or stressed; calm and unworried.
meanings.sent1: Despite the chaos, she remained easygoing and composed.
meanings.sent2: His easygoing demeanor helped diffuse tense situations at work.
meanings.sent3: The easygoing reaction to the spilled milk turned into a funny moment.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an easygoing lake, unruffled by the storm around her.
meanings.sent5: The easygoing smile on his face never faded, no matter the circumstances.
